title: Bloomberg Markets: Perdue Faces Probe Over Opioid Marketing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Perdue Faces Probe Over Opioid Marketing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Esmé Deprez\u0010Projects and Investigations Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Federal prosecutors in Connecticut began a criminal investigation into Purdue Pharma Inc.’s marketing of the controversial opioid painkiller OxyContin.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
